SongName: (Sittin' On) The Dock of the Bay
Album: Dreams to Remember: The Otis Redding Anthology
Lyric:
[00:-7.52]Craig David - (Sittin' On) The Dock Of The Bay

[00:09.47]

[00:11.06]Sittin' in the morning sun

[00:15.64]I'll be sittin' when the evening comes

[00:21.71]Watching the ships roll in

[00:26.44]Then I watch them roll away again, yeah

[00:30.44]

[00:32.26]I'm sittin' on the dock of the bay

[00:36.24]Watchin' the tide roll away, ooh

[00:42.21]I'm just sittin' on the dock of the bay

[00:46.98]Wastin' time

[00:51.98]

[00:53.36]I left my home in Georgia

[00:58.92]Headed for the Frisco Bay

[01:04.05]Cuz I've had nothing to live for

[01:08.88]And look like nothing's gonna come my way

[01:11.88]

[01:13.32]So, I'm just gon' sit on the dock of the bay

[01:18.96]Watchin' the tide roll away, ooh

[01:24.94]I'm just sittin' on the dock of the bay

[01:30.21]Wastin' time

[01:36.21]

[01:38.23]Looks like nothing's gonna change

[01:43.31]Everything still remains the same

[01:48.76]I can't do what ten people tell me to do

[01:53.57]So I guess I'll remain the same, listen

[01:55.57]

[01:57.14]Sittin' here resting my bones

[02:01.66]And this loneliness won't leave me alone, listen

[02:07.85]Two thousand miles I roam

[02:12.25]Just to make this dock my home, now

[02:16.25]

[02:18.16]I'm just gon' sit at the dock of a bay

[02:22.51]Watchin' the tide roll away, ooh

[02:29.00]Sittin' on the dock of the bay

[02:34.37]Wastin' time

[03:11.58]
